message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. What are your thoughts on this counteroffer?

Bob, I appreciate you countering and engaging in this discussion.  While I understand your perspective on the market value, this product offers unique advantages that I believe justify a higher price point. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000. This reflects my best judgement of its true worth. Let me know what you think.

I understand your perspective on the product's unique advantages, Alice. However, I still believe $1,200,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,300,000. Can you consider this compromise?
